title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1701/89 of 15 June 1989 fixing for the 1989/90 marketing year the amount of the levy in connection with the offsetting of storage costs for sugar
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1701/89
of 15 June 1989
fixing for the 1989/90 marketing year the amount of the levy in connection with the offsetting of storage costs for sugar
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the 1989/90 marketing year, the amount of the levy referred to under the second subparagraph of Article 8 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No 1785/81 is hereby fixed at ECU 3 per 100 kilograms of white sugar.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1989.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 June 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
